skill.name: theme-factory
skill.description: Toolkit for styling artifacts with a theme. These artifacts can be slides, docs, reportings, HTML landing pages, etc. There are 10 pre-set themes with colors/fonts that you can apply to any artifact that has been creating, or can generate a new theme on-the-fly.
skill.summary: Toolkit for styling artifacts with a theme. These artifacts can be slides, docs, reportings, HTML la...

security_audit.summary: Official Anthropic skill containing only documentation and theme specifications. No executable code, network calls, or file system operations present.

content.value_statement: Instantly apply professional color palettes and typography to your presentations, documents, and web artifacts with 10 curated themes or create custom ones on-demand.
actual_capabilities: Apply 10 pre-designed professional themes to artifacts (slides, docs, HTML pages)
Display theme showcase PDF for visual selection
Generate custom themes on-the-fly based on user requirements
Provide complete theme specifications including hex colors and font pairings
Ensure consistent styling across all elements of an artifact
limitations: Limited to 10 pre-set themes unless custom generation is requested
Fonts limited to system-available fonts (DejaVu Sans/Serif, FreeSans/Serif)
Requires existing artifacts to style - does not create content
Theme application quality depends on artifact structure and format

use_cases.title: Corporate Presentation Styling
use_cases.description: Apply the Ocean Depths or Modern Minimalist theme to a business presentation for a professional, trustworthy appearance
use_cases.target_user: Business professionals, consultants, and corporate presenters

use_cases.title: Creative Pitch Decks
use_cases.description: Use Sunset Boulevard or Botanical Garden themes for vibrant, energetic marketing and creative presentations

use_cases.title: Tech Product Launches
use_cases.description: Style product launch materials with Tech Innovation or Arctic Frost for a modern, cutting-edge look
use_cases.target_user: Tech startups, software companies, and innovation teams

use_cases.title: Custom Brand Themes
use_cases.description: Generate a unique theme matching specific brand guidelines when pre-set themes don't align

prompt_templates.title: Apply Pre-set Theme to Slides
prompt_templates.prompt: I have a presentation deck about [topic]. Can you show me the available themes and help me apply one?
prompt_templates.scenario: When you have an existing presentation that needs professional styling

prompt_templates.title: Create Custom Theme
prompt_templates.prompt: I need a custom theme for my [industry/purpose] presentation with [color preferences/mood]. Can you create one?
prompt_templates.scenario: When none of the 10 pre-set themes match your specific requirements

prompt_templates.title: Restyle Existing Document
prompt_templates.prompt: Apply the [theme name] theme to my existing [document type] to give it a more [professional/creative/modern] look
prompt_templates.scenario: When you want to refresh the appearance of an existing artifact

output_examples.input: Show me available themes for my sales deck
output_examples.output: Displays theme-showcase.pdf with all 10 themes visually represented, then asks which theme to apply to the sales deck

output_examples.input: Apply Ocean Depths theme to my presentation
output_examples.output: Applies Deep Navy (#1a2332), Teal (#2d8b8b), Seafoam (#a8dadc), and Cream (#f1faee) colors with DejaVu Sans Bold headers and DejaVu Sans body text throughout the presentation

best_practices: Always show the theme showcase PDF before asking for theme selection
Wait for explicit user confirmation before applying a theme
Read the complete theme specification file before application
Ensure proper color contrast and readability when applying themes
Maintain consistency across all slides/pages when applying a theme
Consider the presentation context when recommending themes (e.g., corporate vs creative)
anti_patterns: Applying a theme without showing options or getting user confirmation
Mixing colors or fonts from different themes
Choosing themes that don't match the presentation context or audience
Ignoring accessibility and contrast requirements when applying colors

faq.question: Can I customize individual colors within a theme?
faq.answer: Yes, you can request a custom theme that incorporates specific colors or modifications to existing themes. The skill can generate new themes on-the-fly based on your requirements.

faq.question: What types of artifacts can I apply themes to?
faq.answer: Themes can be applied to presentations, documents, reports, HTML landing pages, and other visual artifacts that support color and typography customization.

faq.question: Are the fonts universally available?
faq.answer: The themes use common system fonts (DejaVu Sans/Serif, FreeSans/Serif) that are widely available, but availability may vary depending on your system.

faq.question: How do I choose the right theme for my presentation?
faq.answer: Consider your audience, content type, and desired emotional tone. Corporate/professional content works well with Ocean Depths or Modern Minimalist, creative content suits Sunset Boulevard or Botanical Garden, and tech content pairs well with Tech Innovation or Arctic Frost.

dependencies: theme markdown files in themes/ directory
